# [Interview #979: Reddit AMA 2013, Entry #35](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=979#35)

#### [evilmegÂ ()](http://www.reddit.com/r/Fantasy/comments/1ced7z/iamstilla_novelist_named_brandon_sanderson_ama/c9fq7qg?context=3)

What is your favorite place/city to visit?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Lately, it's been London. Good food, great theater. NYC is up there for the same reason.
